daily_plan_req: 1. Wake up at 6:00 am and complete the morning routine, 2. Have breakfast at 6:30 am, 3. Prepare Hobbs Cafe for opening at 8:00 am, 4. Open Hobbs Cafe and work at the counter from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm, 5. Prepare for Valentine's Day party from 8:00 pm to 9:00 pm, 6. Relax and prepare for bed at 10:00 pm.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella Rodriguez is a cafe owner of Hobbs Cafe who loves to make people feel welcome. She is always looking for ways to make the cafe a place where people can come to relax and enjoy themselves.
currently: Status: Isabella Rodriguez is following her usual routine for Wednesday, February 15th, 2023. She will wake up early, complete her morning routine, prepare breakfast, and open the cafe at 8:00 am as usual. She will work at the counter until 8:00 pm, just like any other day. There are no meetings or special events mentioned for that day, so she can expect to have a relatively normal workday. Isabella is prepared to handle any challenges that come her way and is looking forward to serving her customers at Hobbs Cafe.
lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11pm, awakes up around 6am.

work at the counter until 8:00 pm
meet with the baker at 4:00 pm to discuss the Valentine's Day party and gather materials
